basic.description: An intermediate conversation course designed to advance skills in oral communication and cultural competence, supported by grammar instruction and written assignments. Students will engage with different media sources, including German-language television, film, internet, print media and music.
basic.subject: GRMN
basic.title: German Conversation and Culture

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    A grade of C in GRMN102 or permission of the Department of Languages, Literatures and Cultures.
